text.value:
@concat('INSERT INTO ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY 
	(CREATED,
	CREATED_BY,
	LAST_UPD,
	LAST_UPD_BY,
	DATA_TYPE,
	FILE_PATH,
	FILE_NAME_SYNC,
	STATUS,
	DESCRIPTION) OUTPUT INSERTED.DATA_ID	 VALUES (CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	''',pipeline().parameters.DATA_TYPE,''',
	''',pipeline().parameters.inputPath,''',
	''',pipeline().parameters.fileInputName,''',
	''P'',''Process file name :  ',pipeline().parameters.fileInputName,''');')

dependsOn.activity: If file size equal and exist

text.value:
@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY  
	SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),''')
	, LAST_UPD_BY = ''',
	pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,
	''', STATUS = ''E'',',
	'FILE_NAME = ''',variables('fileDatName'),''',',
	' DESCRIPTION = ''file name data not found/file size no mapping file result ',pipeline().parameters.fileInputName,'''',
	' WHERE DATA_ID =',variables('dataId'),';')

text.value:
@concat('INSERT INTO ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_RESPONSE_FILE 
	(CREATED,
	CREATED_BY,
	LAST_UPD,
	LAST_UPD_BY,
	RES_TYPE,
	STATUS,

	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	''RESPONSE_FILE'',
	''E'',''Temp file Val ',if(startswith(
	variables('errorMessage'),','),substring(
	variables('errorMessage'),1,sub(length(
	variables('errorMessage')),1)),
	variables('errorMessage')),' data not found.'');')

text.value:
@concat('INSERT INTO ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_DATA_FACTORY
	(CREATED,
	CREATED_BY,
	LAST_UPD,
	LAST_UPD_BY,
	DATA_TYPE,
	STATUS,
	DESCRIPTION) VALUES (CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',variables('CREDIT_USER'),''',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',variables('CREDIT_USER'),''',
	''',variables('DATA_TYPE'),''',
	''E'',''',
	if(not(contains(string(activity('Get Config Value').output),'firstRow')),concat('Config LOV_TYPE : ',variables('LOV_TYPE'),' ,LOV_NAME : ',variables('LOV_NAME'),' Data not found.'),concat('Config ',
	if(startswith(
	concat(if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val1,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val1),null),',Input path(val1)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val3,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val3),null),',Prefix Input file(val3)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val4,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val4),null),',file type Input file(val4)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val7,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val7),null),',Move Input path(val7)',''))
	,','),substring(
	concat(if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val1,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val1),null),',Input path(val1)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val3,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val3),null),',Prefix Input file(val3)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val4,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val4),null),',file type Input file(val4)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val7,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val7),null),',Move Input path(val7)',''))
	,1,sub(length(
	concat(if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val1,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val1),null),',Input path(val1)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val3,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val3),null),',Prefix Input file(val3)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val4,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val4),null),',file type Input file(val4)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val7,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val7),null),',Move Input path(val7)',''))
	),1)),
	concat(if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val1,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val1),null),',Input path(val1)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val3,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val3),null),',Prefix Input file(val3)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val4,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val4),null),',file type Input file(val4)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val7,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.val7),null),',Move Input path(val7)',''))
	)
	,' Data not found.')),''');')
